html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-06642023-06-23IRCC, GAC, TB
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCertain Fees Paid or Payable for the Acquisition of Permanent Resident Status, Travel Document Services and Consular Services (Resettlement from Afghanistan) Remission Order
PrecisCERTAIN FEES PAID OR PAYABLE FOR THE ACQUISITION OF PERMANENT RESIDENT STATUS, TRAVEL DOCUMENT SERVICES (RESETTLEMENT FROM AFGHANISTAN) REMISSION ORDER in order to (1) reimburse fees relating to the issuance of the Right of Permanent Residence Fee (RPRF) to family members who paid the fee on behalf of Afghan nationals who came to Canada; and (2) remit the RPRF, emergency travel document fees, and consular services fees that were administratively waived for Afghan nationals, permanent residents and Canadian citizens who relocated to Canada.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Certain Fees Paid or Payable for the Acquisition of Permanent Resident Status, Travel Document Services and Consular Services (Resettlement from Afghanistan) Remission Order
precis: CERTAIN FEES PAID OR PAYABLE FOR THE ACQUISITION OF PERMANENT RESIDENT STATUS, TRAVEL DOCUMENT SERVICES (RESETTLEMENT FROM AFGHANISTAN) REMISSION ORDER in order to (1) reimburse fees relating to the issuance of the Right of Permanent Residence Fee (RPRF) to family members who paid the fee on behalf of Afghan nationals who came to Canada; and (2) remit the RPRF, emergency travel document fees, and consular services fees that were administratively waived for Afghan nationals, permanent residents and Canadian citizens who relocated to Canada.
